column1: Animoca Brands' Yat Siu Appointed to Hong Kong Task Force on Web3 Development;;https://datacenternews.asia/job-moves/animoca-brands-yat-siu-appointed-to-hong-kong-task-force-on-web3-development;;Yat Siu
column3: Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region
column5: Task Force.;;Yes;;The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region has appointed Yat Siu
column6: co-founder and executive chairman of Animoca Brands
column7: to lead a Task Force on Promoting Web3 Development. This appointment demonstrates Hong Kong's commitment to embracing the potential of Web3
column10: establishing itself as a hub for innovation and development. The Task Force aims to steer Hong Kong towards becoming a leader in the evolving digital landscape by appointing industry experts.

column1: Venture Global LNG Seeks Approval to Speed Up Plant Construction | Pipeline and Gas Journal;;https://pgjonline.com/news/2023/june/venture-global-lng-seeks-approval-to-speed-up-plant-construction;;Venture Global LNG
column10: Calcasieu Pass LNG Plant.;;Yes;;Venture Global LNG has requested an expedited review to allow for 24-hour work seven days per week for its Plaquemines LNG export project. The company aims to accelerate construction and begin exports by late 2021. The project plans to reach a capacity of 20 million tonnes per annum (MTPA) and has customers such as Exxon Mobil
column16: and Excelerate Energy. Venture Global also has plans for 70 MTPA of LNG export capacity in Louisiana

column1: US Dept of Energy Grants Export License to Gulfstream LNG | Pipeline and Gas Journal;;https://pgjonline.com/news/2023/june/us-dept-of-energy-grants-export-license-to-gulfstream-lng;;Gulfstream LNG Development
column5: FTA;;Yes;;Gulfstream LNG Development has received an export authorization from the U.S. Department of Energy. The company has also signed a term-sheet with a gas transportation company and expects to receive non-FTA approval once its FERC application has progressed.
